nodes.text: Hoersch-Kessel Drive Inc., alternatively Hoersch-Kessel Drive, Inc., was a starship manufacturing company. They produced ships used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars, including the Lucrehulk-class LH-3210 cargo freighter, the Lucrehulk-class Battleship, and the Munificent-class star frigate.

Hoersch-Kessel Drive Inc. was first mentioned, as Hoersch-Kessel Drive, Inc., in The Star Wars Sourcebook, a 1987 Star Wars Legends supplement written by Bill Slavicsek and Curtis Smith for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It became canon when it was mentioned in Ultimate Star Wars, a reference book co-written by Patricia Barr, Adam Bray, Daniel Wallace, and Ryder Windham that was released on April 28, 2015.
